title: Ticket #4194: Remotely query DAG node status
description:
From Brian Bockelman: 

   After converting the CMS CRAB application to be DAGMan-based, I found
   myself missing or implementing the following capabilities:


   0) Remotely querying node status.  The webserver which gives user
   status
   is on a separate host from the schedd.  We can remotely ask the schedd
   about the status of job X, but cannot inquire the status of node X

We have to think about the best way to do this...
creator: wenger
